definition: Hongqiao district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]
Hongqiao district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]

sentences.english: Volunteers at the Hongqiao Station greet international visitors in foreign tongues.
sentences.chinese: 紅橋站點的志願者們用各國本國語言向外國朋友問候。

sentences.english: The antiques, cultural relics, scripts and paintings available at this market are also inexpensive.
sentences.chinese: 紅橋市場的文物字畫和古玩也以價格低廉爲特色。

sentences.english: The government spent two years building a red bridge spanning the gorge.
sentences.chinese: 政府花了兩年的時間製作一座高出那座峽谷的紅橋。

sentences.english: South red produced in the County Town , has one hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 產於縣南紅橋鎮，有一百多年曆史。

sentences.english: Locals call them red bridge boards.
sentences.chinese: 人們把它們叫做紅橋板。

definition: Fengcheng Manzu autonomous county in Liaoning
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
